value.title: Baidu and ON Semiconductor Team Up With Eye on Image Sensors for Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Baidu Apollo has partnered with Phoenix-headquartered semiconductor supplier ON Semiconductor to set up a joint studio to explore image sensor solutions for autonomous driving, a move that could give it an edge in developing driverless vehicles.
